original_text: For this perhaps is why he was parted from you for a while, that you might have him back forever,
korean_text: 아마 그가 잠시 떠나게 된 것은 너로 하여금 그를 영원히 두게 함이리니

sentences.original_text: For this perhaps is why he was parted from you for a while
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 이것이 그가 잠시 당신에게서 떠나게 된 이유입니다,

sentences.original_text: that you might have him back forever
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그를 영원히 되찾게 하려는 것입니다,
